primevc.utils.NumberUtil
Quick convenience utilities for floating point numbers.

Static Methods

inline isEmpty(value : Float) : Bool

inline isSet(value : Float) : Bool

inline isWithin(value : Float, min : Float, max : Float) : Bool

parameters
value
min
max
returns
true or false
Helper function to check of the given value is between the min and max value.

inline notEmpty(value : Float) : Bool

inline notSet(value : Float) : Bool

inline round(value : Float, ?precision : Int) : Float

inline unset() : Float

inline within(value : Float, min : Float, max : Float) : Float

parameters
value
min
max
Helper function which will return the float-value of the first parameter as long as it is between the min and max values.
